title: Bug 86057expect error when overriding final pointcuts
description: Bug 86057expect error when overriding final pointcuts I get no compiler error when I "override"/redefine a final pointcut:public class Main {static void walk() {}static void run() {}public static void main(String[] args) {walk();run();}}abstract aspect AA {public final pointcut publicPointcut() : call(void walk());before() : publicPointcut() { System.out.print("here: " + thisJoinPoint); }}aspect AA1 extends AA {// expecting error here b/c pointcut is finalpublic pointcut publicPointcut() : call(void run());}When run, it picks out run() rather than walk().
